full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHER SNYING GI BZLOG BSGYUR YE SHES KYIS RDO RJE'I THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO @011B RIN PO CHE, CHO RIGS PA NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG JANG JONG CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA BA BSTAN SRID KYI RIGS PA DANG LDAN PA, GUNG MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHA AA HA'I DANG, GSO RTZI RIG PA'I GLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE THU TAR HANG THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS SBYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'NG NAN TAN CHEN PA'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAntI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYA PAN CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSA'I BA RGYAL MTSAN BRTAG PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI BAR DU PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS, PHAN PA DANG BDE BA CHEN PO'I RGYUR GYUR CIG, , ,) MANGGA LAm,, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG, ,,LEGS SO,, ,,
